wynn-extras.features.sync.insecure: [Wynn Extras] Please change the 'room ID' in the mod config.
text.autoconfig.wynn-extras.title: Wynn Extras
text.autoconfig.wynn-extras.option.roomI: This can be any number, but it cannot be the default value.
text.autoconfig.wynn-extras.option.enabl: When enabled, logging info to chat will be toggled on by default.
text.autoconfig.wynn-extras.option.disco: The discovery server must be running a JP2P-based server.
